website_summaries.verdict: Built for the rugged outdoors, the Under Armour Syncline is a super light and comfortable hiker that can be used in and around the water. Touted for its innovative BOA lacing system, highly breathable upper, and its versatile construction, this shoe is sure to give you a great time in the outdoors. It also ticks the box in terms of performance.Amidst some concerns over the tongue being too thin, this shoe from Under Armour is certainly a great choice for anyone looking for quality footwear for land and water adventures.
pros: Numerous Under Armour Syncline reviews speak of its out-of-the-box comfort
Lots of hikers love the BOA lacing system that makes adjusting the fit quick and easy
It's a very lightweight hiking shoe, according to some
Many are impressed by the solid construction of the Under Armour Syncline hiking shoes
The breathable upper makes it an excellent all-around summer footwear, mention a significant number of reviewers
It has exceeded many customers' expectations in terms of performance
It also rocks in terms of versatility
Some people use it for sports, obstacle races, water hiking, and so much more
cons: A few wearers have expressed concerns over the lack of padding in the tongue which corresponds to less protection

customer_reviews.title: BOA system for the win!!
customer_reviews.text: Had a pair of under armour shoes in the past and hated them, they had no grip. Wanted to give it another try especially with these having the BOA system. These shoes are amazing! Great grip, good arch support, very light, and you can not beat that BOA system! You can not feel the wires unless you over tighten it which then your foot would be in pain just like if you were to do it with laces. Totally would buy again and might even pick up the tan ones!
customer_reviews.author: Quentin M.

customer_reviews.title: Super Comfortable and Great Traction - NOT for 'ankle drummers'
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is about everything I expected and looks even better than in the photos, super solid color. Makes me want to get a second pair! The bizarre and tacky-seeming lacing cable is downright saved by the 'BOA' emblem on the knob, which suddenly makes it totally fine. The caveat is - I will try to explain this - that same knob where the tightening/loosening of cables is done, will not be super fun if you like to curl both ankles together and do 'drumming' with your foot while seated, like architects or violin players, etc. because the knob goes straight into your ankle and you don't expect it. So, don't do that! lol Overall excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Kerrigan

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe. I have 2 pair.
customer_reviews.text: I love how lightweight and breathable these shoes are. I have no idea what one reviewer was talking about pain associated with the thin tongue after tightening the Boa. These are one of the most comfortable shoes I have ever owned and I especially love the Boa system. My cycling shoes also have Boa. I wish more shoes would offer that option. I am considering about getting a third pair.
customer_reviews.author: M. Lagman

customer_reviews.title: Size Runs a Bit Small
customer_reviews.text: First - I have been a huge fan of the BOA lacing system since I tried a pair of running shoes from REI (sadly since discontinued). I have also been a big fan of Under Armour running shoes so I expected these hiking shoes to be fantastic - and they delivered....almost. I made the mistake of assuming that sizing would run true across all the brand's shoes, which was a mistake. My men's 11.5 are just a wee bit too tight in the toes - not enough to send them back, but next time I'll make the jump to a 12. Other than that they are fantastic - and I would highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Michael D. Story

customer_reviews.title: Get half size bigger than your usual.
customer_reviews.text: These are great looking and comfortable shoes. I just received them today 12/17/19. I usually wear 10.5 but went .5 size up to 11 as suggested by a previous review. That fit me perfectly. I would recommend. Especially if you’ll be walking around. The Boa fit system is really cool and tightens the shoe just right so your feet aren’t sliding around. I wish I had these for my trip to Japan earlier this year.
customer_reviews.author: Salil Bhatnagar

customer_reviews.title: Tongue way too thin
customer_reviews.text: You can feel the pressure of the boa laces on this shoe because the tongue is barely as thick as a pair of socks so there's no isolation from these thin wirey laces and that kind of pressure on top of my foot is very noticeable. I'd be surprised if this doesn't bother just about everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Tech.Tennis

customer_reviews.title: Great kicks
customer_reviews.text: Very light and super comfortable. Love the lacing system, fast and easy to tighten/loosen, but i question how durable it'll be over time. Excellent grip, look forward to testing on boat during swells/chop. I dig the design, the modern technical aesthetic appeals to me. Shoe is well constructed. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: RDubya73

customer_reviews.title: design over function
customer_reviews.text: I love the shoes except for the location of the closure. My lumbar spine is completely fused which prevents me from bending over to tie my shoes; hence, the attractiveness of the UA shoes. Unfortunately, the closure is on the outside of the foot making it impossible for me to easily tighten the shoe or to loosen the shoe at the end of a hike. If the closure were in the center of the foot or on the inside of the foot, it would be a perfect shoe for me.
customer_reviews.author: tom decotiis

customer_reviews.title: Great lacing for someone with minor motor skill issues
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you get a size up because my son is measured to ware a 8 1/2 to 9 and I had to get a 9 1/2. I love these for my son who is functional Autistic with gross motor skill issues. He is very particular about his clothing and shoes. It became uncomfortable for him as a teenager in middle school to need help tying his shoes in gym and when they came undone. We tried the no tye laces and never got tight enough for his liking. He loves these because all he has to do I'd pop it closed and twist. I wish Under Armour had more shoes with Boa lacing.
customer_reviews.author: H

customer_reviews.title: BOA lacing system rocks.
customer_reviews.text: lightweight, comfortable, and they fit perfect. They are an affordable solution for shoes with boa system. Coming from the cycling world, I thought it would be cool to have regular shoes with boa system laces. Although I wish they had the ones that you can tighten and loosen up by turning the ratchet for micro adjustments (you can only tighten them and release) It's not really necessary since you are not on a bike trying to adjust your shoes. It's easy to adjust and hold your foot firmly on the shoe. I'm very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Hugo Armando Figueroa

customer_reviews.title: Great looking and even better fit.
customer_reviews.text: If you like the look of these shoes as I do you then you should like the feel of them too. The BOA allows you to tighten them to a snug or loose fit. I bought these because I love my BOA golf shoes and these didn't disappoint me at all either. If they cam in a different color I'd be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Shep.

customer_reviews.title: Quality Materials, Lightweight,
customer_reviews.text: Great for running or even in the water with the heavy mesh top material. It’s very breathable to reduce heat/sweat. Best for summer or those who sweat a lot. Perfect size with no socks but if you wear socks, order 1/2 size larger.
customer_reviews.author: David in Dallas

customer_reviews.title: Decent hiking shoe
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for hiking only. The perform well on solid stable ground. The bottom of the shoe is a cleated style and isn’t good for loose unstable ground and is prone to slipping. Comfortable enough to spend all day in the right conditions.
customer_reviews.author: Leif

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Working in deployed desert environment; these are outstanding! Light, ventilated, easy to clean, 1000% better than my boots!
customer_reviews.author: John N. Conley

customer_reviews.title: Not adjustable
customer_reviews.text: I’ve owned many different boa running shoes since North Face brought them to the market several years ago. Unlike the pairs that I’ve purchased in the past, these shoes were tight on the top, which made the boa adjustments useless. All other boa shoes have a open top which adjusts the snugness of the shoe to fit to your foot. This is a poor design. This is the first pair of boa running shoes that I’ve ever was disappointed with.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: great shoe order one size larger
customer_reviews.text: Under armor products sizes are smaller than most .Shoe is great a little tight at first . nedd to order a size larger.
customer_reviews.author: Woodrow Franklin

customer_reviews.title: They are BRIGHT BLUE  !!!!!
customer_reviews.text: We have to buy BOA tennis shoes, as son is handicapped and can't tie them. These are colorful and he really likes that. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Surprise, Az

customer_reviews.title: Holds the foot like an Ace wrap...
customer_reviews.text: Have Recently had an ankle replacement they shoe holds the arch without putting undue pressure on the ankle in the light weight material of the shoe plus a strength and support of the soul is quite helpful
customer_reviews.author: Stryder

customer_reviews.title: Fits as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. I use them for every day life. I also work out in them and run. Extremely awesome shoes. I am a huge fan of under armour
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love the dial on these great idea and sleek look.
customer_reviews.author: Donavan Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shoes and quality-price relation is tremendous!
customer_reviews.text: Excelent product! Looks super nice and PRO. I'm an Ultra Distance Walker competitor and I fell excellent with this hiking shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Haibi

customer_reviews.title: The future is here!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable fit but the best part is the ease of taking em off and putting em on, my second pair with the BOA system.....wave of the future
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe for mountain biking.
customer_reviews.text: These are a slightly above average hiking shoe. I bought them for mountain biking only, mostly because I liked the BOA lace feature, that works great. I dnt think I would love the shoe for hiking only.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for hiking in warm weather, nit fir cold weather
customer_reviews.text: I love the looks, the fit and the shoe lace system!
customer_reviews.author: Jose Zuniga

customer_reviews.title: Wayyy too narrow
customer_reviews.text: I have never dealt with a shoe so narrow... absolutely ridiculously narrow ...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for running
customer_reviews.text: Best light weight running shoe I’ve worn in a long time. I love the Boa lace system as well
customer_reviews.author: johnathan sturrup

customer_reviews.title: Perfect lacing, comfy trekking shoes
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. I wish all my next choices could fit as this one. Exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Andrzej Strauss

customer_reviews.title: Nice!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe! The BOA system is amazing and I will never by an other shoe without this system.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The laces are great highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: The BOA laces are awesome. I wear 13 and they fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Mullen

customer_reviews.title: Standardized shoe sizes
customer_reviews.text: I like the shoe but I’m normally a 8.5 and I bought a 9 and it’s still too small
customer_reviews.author: Dennis C.

customer_reviews.title: Not a walking hiking shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, but really is a specilty shoe only for cycling?
customer_reviews.author: michael p mcnally

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use
customer_reviews.text: Great product for stroke victims who can't tie a shoe
customer_reviews.author: James Eppinette

customer_reviews.title: Super light and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Awesome show , light , boa system is awesome strongly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Alex Menendez

customer_reviews.title: Too tight around the foot.
customer_reviews.text: Took them on a 8 mile walk the other day, felt like they almost broke the top of my right foot, even after releasing the tension and not even snugging them. Really tight fit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BOA is awesome, but these shoes are smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: I bought these especially for the BOA system, but the shoes are very narrow. I’m going to break them in and try to make them work. Just make sure you have thin socks to wear with these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Long

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: 1st time I bought shoes with Boa system, probably won’t go back to regular laces
customer_reviews.author: Ingvar Smith

customer_reviews.title: The BOA is awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes mainly for the BOA. You can't really imagine how much you want and need BOA on every shoe you have until you actually have a shoe with it. These shoes are very lightweight. The outsole is grippy and gives good traction. Overall, for the price, you can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: F

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. Light, comfortable, bottoms have a lot of grip. Perfect summer shoe. Thinking about trying them for softball and seeing how they do. Fit like normal under armor shoes.
customer_reviews.author: kyle hartwick

product_meta.title: Under Armour Men's Syncline Hiking Shoe
product_meta.description: Dual-layer mesh upper for optimal water drainage. Welded TPU overlays with internal structure for added durabilty, support & abrasion resistance. L6 BOA speed closure system provides a quick & easy locked-in fit that wont lose tension in water environments. Strategically placed drainage ports . Plush foam collar for maximium heel comfort. Charged Cushioning in the heel absorbs impact & converts it into a responsive burst of power . Lightweight EVA midsole for optimal cushioning. High traction rubber lug outsole for grip on a variety of surfaces & conditions. Offset: 7mm .
feature_bullets: Dual layer mesh upper for optimal water drainage
Welded TPU overlays with internal structure for added durabilty, support & abrasion resistance
Material Composition: UPPER: 55% Synthetic,45% Textile~OUTSOLE: 100% Rubber
L6 BOA speed closure system provides a quick & easy locked in fit that wont lose tension in water environments
Plush foam collar for maximium heel comfort
